In some countries, non-guaranteed hours contracts may be further classified as either permanent
or temporary according to national legislation. Hence, in these countries the undertaking reports
those non-guaranteed hours employees under paragraph 50 (b)(iii) and also under paragraph 50
(b)(i) or (ii). The provision of contextual information in ESRS S1 paragraph 50 (e) requires
